title: Edward's Exploit and Other Thomas the Tank Engine Stories (Thomas & Friends) (Pictureback
description: Full-color photos. Edward proves to Gordon and James that even though he's an old-fashioned engine, he can still "chug-chug" with the best of them. Other tales in the collection are "Donald and Douglas," "The Deputation," and "The Diseasal."
author: W. Awdry
